resources.string: Ntxiv ib Sling Daws hu caw ntawm…
Thaub qab xiam oob qhab. Koj puas xav kom kho backup kev teeb tsa thiab ua kom qhov no qhia tseg?
%s muaj ib tug xav paub ntau tshaj los sis tsis ntev los no ntaus ntawv tseem ceeb, yog koj paub tseeb tias koj xav siv qhov no laus dua ib tug?
Cov ntaub ntawv npe %s twb tshwm sim. Overwrite?
Tsis muaj ib tug Google Account koj yuav tsuas muaj peev xwm xa, TSIS tau txais cov lus. Koj puas xav kom ntxiv ib Google account?
Peb xav tau koj kev pab txhim kho SafeSlinger. Koj puas xav kom cia li xa tej uas tsis rau peb?
Txhua tus mej zeej yuav tsum tau txawj tej yam ntxiv, ib txhia siv laus tseem ceeb hom siv los qhia.
Suab neeg uas ua ntawv Txiav suab yuam kev.
Tsis muaj peev xwm ua si rau cov ntaubntawv.
Suab Recorder maub cov xov yuam kev.
Microphone kev tso cai yuav tsum tau sau ib tug ruaj ntseg suab lus. Ntiv tus %s khawm rau SafeSlinger microphone kev tso cai kom paub meej.
Vim ib tug kab laum nyob rau hauv Android 4.1, koj yuav tau uninstall thiab tau rov qab cog SafeSlinger.
Ib tug Google account yog yuav tsum tau. Thov qhib lub account saib xyuas thiab ntxiv ib Google account.
Sau npe tsis authenticated, thov retry manually tom qab.
Npe yog tsis muaj rau qhov no version, thov mus saib rau ib tug tshiab version.
Tsis yog ntaus ntawv rau npe nrog Google. Qhov no ntaus ntawv tsis tam sim no txhawb laub messaging.
Laub sau npe pab tsis muaj, teem sij hawm nyob rau hauv retry %d vib nas this.
Ntau daim ntawv sau npe sau npe rau Laub. Thov uninstall ib co lwm yam kev siv thiab retry.
Tsis muaj peev xwm xa ib qho kev npliag Symptoms.
Tsis muaj peev xwm xa txuas tshaj %d bytes nyob rau hauv loj.
Tsis muaj peev xwm xa ib tug tsis raug cai Symptoms.
Hu creation ua tsis tau tejyam.
Hu insert ua tsis tau tejyam.
Qhov no hu uas ploj lawm ib lub npe, thov kho kom raug.
Qhov no hu uas ploj lawm ib lub npe, thov reselect.
Hu update ua tsis tau tejyam.
Yuav tsis extract private tseem ceeb.
%1$s yog tsis txais kev txhawb on %2$s lub sij hawm no.
Cov ntaub ntawv cia yog tsis muaj.
Ib tug siv tau hu lub npe yog yuav tsum tau.
Meem Tsis tau txais kev pabcuam.
Cov kev tseem ceeb hom ntawv yog tsis tseeb.
Kos Npe pov thawj ua tsis tau tejyam.
SafeSlinger tsis ntes NDK kev pab txhawb nqa rau ntaus ntawv no, uas yog yuav tsum tau.
Koj sim xa ntau yam khoom. Thaum lub sij hawm no, SafeSlinger tsuas txhawb xa ib yam khoom nyob rau hauv ib lub sij hawm.
Koj tau tshaj cov lus pes tsawg rau cov uas tau txais kev pabcuam. Thov retry tom qab.
Uas tau txais kev pabcuam muaj ib tug ploj lawm los yog phem laub sau npe. Koj yuav tsum nres xa lus rau qhov no ntaus ntawv.
Cov lus yog loj heev. Txo qhov luaj li cas ntawm cov lus.
Uas tau txais kev pabcuam laub sau npe yog tsis siv tau. Tus neeg tej zaum yuav muaj uninstalled SafeSlinger los yog muab tua cov ntawv qhia. Koj yuav tsum nres xa lus rau qhov no ntaus ntawv.
Muaj ib qho kev yuam kev sib txuas lus nrog lub laub ceeb toom cov kev pab cuam.
Koj tau tshaj cov lus pes tsawg rau qhov no ntaus ntawv. Thov retry tom qab.
Ceeb toom cov kev pab cuam no tsis yog muaj nyob rau lub sij hawm no. Thov koj sim xa cov lus tom qab.
Tsis muaj peev xwm npaj lub suab Recorder.
Pib, Sling Daws nrog lwm tus neeg siv nyob rau tib lub sij hawm.
Koj xav tau ib tug los yog ib tug txuas text lus rau xa.
Tsis muaj peev xwm tshem tawm cov muab qhia cov ntaub ntawv.
Tsis tau phim pej xeem yuam sij rau private tseem ceeb nyob rau hauv crypto mob.
Tsis muaj cuab kav cawm rau cov lus database.
Tsis muaj cuab kav cawm kom tus neeg tau database.
Tsis tau hloov cov lus database.
Tsis tau hloov tus neeg database.
SafeSlinger yuam kev, thov pib dua.
Hu cov ntaub ntawv twb formatted incorrectly.
Siv tshuaj ntsuam no kom teem koj lub npe pauv nrog rau lwm tus, thiab ib tug passphrase los tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv. Ntiv tus Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Pauv yog leejtwg cov ntaub ntawv, xyuas kom meej tag nrho cov neeg siv yog nyob ze los yog nyob rau hauv lub xov tooj. Cov Pib Txauv khawm yuav pauv tsuas yog tus soj ntsuam cov ntaub ntawv tiv tauj.

Tej zaum koj kuj hloov tus kheej cov ntaub ntawv txog koj tus kheej nyob rau hauv no screen los ntawm tapping nyob rau hauv lub khawm nrog koj lub npe. Qhov no yuav tso saib ib tug zaub mov uas koj mus kho kom raug neeg koj hu, Tsim Tshiab sib cuag, los yog Siv Lwm tiv tauj.
Qhov no qhia txog tag nrho cov kev tshuaj ntsuam yav dhau los cov lus, thiab txuas uas tseem muaj rau download.

Siv tshuaj ntsuam no kom login rau hauv daim ntawv thov nrog koj tus passphrase. Yog tias koj tsis nco qab lawm tau koj passphrase, tej zaum koj yuav tsim ib tug tshiab tseem ceeb tiv thaiv los ntawm ib tug tshiab los ntawm passphrase tapping lub Tsis nco qab Passphrase? khawm. Ntiv tus neeg siv lub npe hloov ntawm ntau yam yuam sij.
Siv tshuaj ntsuam no hloov koj passphrase los nkag koj lub xeem passphrase rau kev paub thiab cov tshiab passphrase.
Tiv tauj nrog SafeSlinger yuam sij tshwm ntawm no, xaiv ib tug xa koj cov lus mus rau.
Thaum tiav lawm, tus raws tu qauv yuav qhia tau ib daim ntawv teev cov ntaub ntawv qhia tias yog leejtwg exchanged. Xaiv lub lub neeg uas nyob ze koj xav txuag thiab nias Import.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj mus xaiv ob tug neeg koj tau slung yuam sij nrog ua ntej mus rau securely xa lawv cov yuam sij rau ib leeg. Cias nias kom paub thaum npaj txhij.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj mus xaiv ib co ntaub ntawv thiab ib tug neeg tau kev pab xa mus rau. Cias nias Xa thaum npaj txhij.
Tshuaj ntsuam no tso cai rau koj mus pauv tau qhov neej ntawd nqis rau hauv daim ntawv thov.
Lub koob yees duab kev tso cai yuav tsum muab snapshots mus ua lus. Ntiv tus %s khawm rau SafeSlinger Yees kev tso cai kom paub meej.
Neeg uas nyob ze kev tso cai yog yuav tsum tau rau securely sib koom hu phaib. Ntiv tus %s khawm rau SafeSlinger Hu tso cai kom paub meej.
Laub sau npe yog uas ploj lawm.
Ceeb toom kev tso cai rau tog twg los qhia los yog banners, thiab muaj daim xov tooj, yuav tsum rau kev ruaj ntseg messaging. Ntiv tus %s khawm rau SafeSlinger Qhia kev tso cai kom paub meej.
SafeSlinger yog tsis optimized rau iOS 5.x kiag li lawm. SafeSlinger yuav tsum iOS 6 los yog siab dua.
Duab Library kev tso cai yuav tsum tau muab cov duab mus ua lus. Ntiv tus %s khawm rau SafeSlinger duab Library kev tso cai kom paub meej.

Koj yuav xaiv koj hu card xa koj cov phooj ywg thiab SafeSlinger yuav encrypt nws rau koj. Yuav pab kom qhov no feature, koj yuav tsum tso cai rau SafeSlinger saib tau koj cov xov tooj nyob thaum nug.
Koj yuav sau ib lub suab lus xa koj cov phooj ywg thiab SafeSlinger yuav encrypt nws rau koj. Yuav pab kom qhov no feature, koj yuav tsum tso cai rau SafeSlinger saib tau koj microphone thaum nug.

SafeSlinger yog ib qho encrypted messaging daim ntawv thov thiab yuav tsis ua yam uas tsis tau tas lus los ntawm cov ntawv qhia tuaj. Mus pab kom tuaj lus, koj yuav tsum tso cai rau SafeSlinger xa koj cov ntawv qhia thaum nug.
Kov mus saib koj cov lus %d
Koj tseem ceeb tau hloov: Sling Daws dua.
Yuav pib messaging, Sling Daws nrog no neeg siv nyob rau tib lub sij hawm.
Ntsiab hom deprecated: Sling Daws dua.
Sau koj lub npe thiab ib tug passphrase los tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv:
Ntiv koj lub npe mus ntxiv los yog tshem tawm cov ntaub ntawv tiv tauj, xyuas yam khoom uas koj xav qhia, thiab siv Pib Txauv thaum lwm tus neeg yog npaj txhij mus pauv:
SafeSlinger iCloud yog enabled. Ntiv tus Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Tsis muaj lus. Tej zaum koj yuav xa lus los ntawm cov ntseg tab.

Mus ntxiv tus tau txais, koj yuav tsum thawj Sling Daws nrog rau ib los yog ntau tshaj lwm cov neeg nyob rau tib lub sij hawm. Tej zaum koj yuav tau xa ib tug Sling Daws hu caw los ntawm cov ntawv qhia zaub mov.
Tsis muab qhia cov ntaub ntawv. Txuas koj ntaus ntawv nrog iTunes thiab cab cov ntaub ntawv mus rau lub koom nplaub tshev.
Xaiv ib tug neeg xa lus mus rau:
Tos tus tau txais los qhia securely:
Tos ib cov ntaub ntawv mus rau muab:
Kuv xav los qhia %s rau koj.

Mus teeb ib tug ruaj ntseg messaging kev twb kev txuas, peb yuav tau raws li los yog xov tooj txhua lwm yam nyob rau tib lub sij hawm, thiab ces Sling Daws xwb ib zaug kom paub tseeb lub kev twb kev txuas.
Peb yuav pib ruaj ntseg messaging nrog qhib qhov SafeSlinger iPhone los yog hauv xov tooj ntawd app?
Feem ntau cov tsis ntev los no xwb
Kuv tshiab SafeSlinger ntawv yog nrog.
%d Cov ntaub ntawv tsis mus Qhia:
Xyuas neeg uas nyob ze koj xav kom hloov nyob rau hauv koj qhov chaw nyob phau ntawv, ces ntaug import txuag ruaj ntseg nyob ze:
Xa Yuam Kev Cov ntaub ntawv
Qhia no hint tom ntej no lub sij hawm.
Cia li download tau lus txuas thaum in thiaj li tso rau hauv.
Cia li decrypt lus thaum in thiaj li tso rau hauv.
Tau txais ntawv ceeb toom thaum backup yog offline.
Qhia ib tug tutorial ua ntej sim Sling Daws.
Ntiv mus download tau cov ntaub ntawv
Ntiv mus qhib cov ntaub ntawv
Ntiv mus rov pib dua lus cua ntsawj ntshab
Ntiv thiab tuav xa daim ntawv pov thawj kev hloov tshiab.
Tej zaum koj yuav optionally pab kom SafeSlinger iCloud backup nyob rau hauv iOS chaw. Ntiv tus Ua khawm thaum tiav lawm.
Kov mus kho backup teeb tsa.
Kov mus kho cache Timeout teeb tsa.

Yuav kom tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv, SafeSlinger tsis cia koj nyob qhov twg passphrase rau rov qab. Tej zaum koj yuav tsuas tau txais thiab cov lus tsim nyob rau hauv tib lub passphrase login. Txawm li cas los, tej zaum koj yuav tsim ib tug tshiab tseem ceeb thiab passphrase, ces rov hais dua Sling Daws nrog koj tus tau txais.
Cov nram qab no yuam sij yuav tshem:
Muaj tsis muaj ntau tsis ntev los no cov yuam sij tshaj koj li.
Tsuas yog cov yuam sij generated ntau tsis ntev los no tshaj koj li, generated rau %s, tej zaum yuav tshem.
Email los ntawm cov xov tooj nyob
Cov ntawv nyeem los ntawm cov xov tooj nyob
Kho kom raug neeg Lub npe
Tsis pub twg paub Txoj cai
generating tseem ceeb, qhov no yuav siv sij hawm ib tug thaum…
tau txais cov ntaub ntawv encrypted…
muab kho dua chaw nyob phau ntawv…
muab kho dua tseem ceeb database…
Lus cawm raws li cua ntsawj ntshab.
Cov ntawv nyeem theej rau daim ntawv tiag.

SafeSlinger yog tsim los yooj yim qhia yog leejtwg cov ntaub ntawv, nyob rau hauv tus neeg los yog hauv xov tooj, authenticated, ntiav, thiab si tauv. Txhua tus neeg uas koj qhia rau tsim ib tug ruaj ntseg kawg-rau-kawg channel xa lus.
Yooj yim sib pauv sib cuag nrog lwm tus neeg
Securely pav phau ntawv, duab, dab tsi!
Muaj zog tiv thaiv koj cov ntaub ntawv cryptography
SafeSlinger: Hais 3 lo lus thiab mus ib txhis li sib tham nyob rau hauv kev thaj yeeb.
Yuav tsum muab ntsia rau ib tug tsawg kawg nkaus ntawm 2 kiag li lawm.
Ib tug kev twb kev txuas Internet yuav tsum kom nquag plias.
